comments.body: Please remove these overrides so that the linter runs with default settings. You might have to change some minor things, but from reading the code, I doubt it will be much.

I have kept the `indent` rule, as it doesn’t have a default, and I use tabs in this type definition.

I have also kept the `prefer‑const: false` rule, as `const` properties must be initialised.

I’ve also added the `dt‑header: false` rule, since the `// TypeScript Version: 2.x` comments in the tests cause it to fail, as they’re not yet supported in tests (which I plan to implement).

`dt-header` complains that the tests contain `// TypeScript Version: 2.x`, like I said in: #33491:

```txt
ERROR: …/DefinitelyTyped/types/tape-async/test/tape-async.async.test.ts:1:1 - TypeScript version should be specified under header in `index.d.ts`. See: https://github.com/Microsoft/dtslint/blob/master/docs/dt-header.md
ERROR: …/DefinitelyTyped/types/tape-async/test/tape-async.generators.test.ts:1:1 - TypeScript version should be specified under header in `index.d.ts`. See: https://github.com/Microsoft/dtslint/blob/master/docs/dt-header.md
```
